tasks.task: Set up and operate a solar-powered irrigation system for a small-scale farmer in Ethiopia.
subtasks: Assemble the solar panel.
Connect the solar panel to the irrigation pump.
Operate the irrigation pump to deliver water to the farm fields.
Use a wetting front detector to monitor water saturation levels.
Adjust irrigation timing based on soil moisture readings.

tasks.task: Recommend the solar-powered irrigation system to other farmers.
subtasks: Educate fellow farmers on the benefits of solar-powered irrigation.
Share experiences and techniques for water conservation.
Encourage the use of locally maintainable irrigation tools.

tasks.task: Increase maize yield through efficient water management.
subtasks: Practice seasonal water storage in tankers.
Implement three-time maize cropping per year.
